In England, in the seven days to 15 June, there were 48,130 new confirmed cases (85.5 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 08 June, there were 36,047 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 34% (12,083 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 20 June is 4,036,230 (7,170.8 cases per 100,000 population).
